name: Dark Desert
description:
You are not supposed to be here. It's time to wake up.

Explore the dark desert. Avoid its inhabitants. Find the keys. Unlock the door. And whatever you do, do NOT get lost!

Created for the 2012 IGF Pirate Kart Compilation.

Tip: Hit trees to get sticks. Sticks = life. If everything looks a bit too dark, it means it would be a perfect time to get a new stick.

I seem to have a bug in Chrome on OSX. The text in the main menu is invisible. Works just fine in firefox. If you don't know what to do, press Space. If you jump, then you are playing the game. ;)
